title: Can we have Normal Draft Pick re-enabled on OCE?
body:
It has been a while since Normal Draft Pick mode was disabled on the OCE server, and since then, the server size seems to have grown substantially. If I remember correctly, the mode was disabled due to people preferring Normal Blind Pick, and that Draft Pick was significantly less.  

Now that the server population has grown, I think it would be worth another trial at having the Draft Pick mode re-enabled. It's been nearly two years since the server was opened, and we are still yet to have another permanent play mode aside from ARAM and Summoner's Rift Normal Blind Pick, Ranked solo and Ranked teams.
